description.value:
Frequency once per hour

The spotlight should always be on you and you alone. Attempt a @check[type:performance|defense:will] check against the Will DCs of all enemies within @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} who can see or hear you. On a success, the targets focus on you and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to hit you, but they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] to all creatures other than yourself. On a critical success, the effect lasts for 3 rounds.
